meanings.definition: The act of becoming swollen or distended.
meanings.sent1: After eating too much, the bloatings in his stomach made him uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The bloatings in the balloon made it float effortlessly in the air.
meanings.sent3: The bloatings in the water balloon made it wobble comically as it was thrown.
meanings.sent4: The bloatings in the clouds signaled an incoming storm.
meanings.sent5: The bloatings in the bread dough caused it to rise beautifully in the oven.

meanings.definition: A condition of being excessively full or swollen.
meanings.sent1: Her bloatings after the big meal made her regret eating so much.
meanings.sent2: The bloatings in the river caused it to flood the nearby fields.
meanings.sent3: The bloatings in the balloon animal made it look hilariously oversized.
meanings.sent4: The bloatings in the traffic jam seemed to stretch for miles.
meanings.sent5: The bloatings in the suitcase made it impossible to close.

meanings.definition: The result of excessive gas or fluid accumulation in the body.
meanings.sent1: His bloatings after drinking soda too quickly were uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The bloatings in the water pipe caused a leak in the basement.
meanings.sent3: The bloatings in the balloon made it comically wobble in the air.
meanings.sent4: The bloatings in the market prices caused a surge in inflation.
meanings.sent5: The bloatings in the pond were a result of heavy rainfall.
